strapiGuide.title: Ultimate Guide of Northwest Arkansas Pizza Places
strapiGuide.description: NWA Daily's guide to the yummy pizza in Northwest Arkansas. A list of local pizza restaurants in Bentonville, Fayetteville, Rogers, Siloam Springs, Eureka Springs, Lowell, Tontitown, Johnson, etc.
strapiGuide.content:
Find yourself craving pizza all the time but never know where you should go? We've got you covered. Northwest Arkansas is home to some amazing pizza places that span a broad range of styles and flavors. Here in NWA, we've got it all - fancy pizza, New York style, Chicago style, traditional pizza, dessert pizza, and even healthy(ish) pizzas. There are so many great places that it's hard to keep track of.

With the help of our readers, we've compiled a list of places to get pies across towns like Fayetteville, Springdale, Rogers, Bentonville, Siloam Springs, and Eureka Springs. This list is by no means all-inclusive and isn't in any order, but is grouped by city for ease of navigation. Cheers to exploring the region one pizza joint at a time!

Did we miss your favorite spot? Send us an email here.

Fayetteville

Wood Stone Craft Pizza

üìç Fayetteville (Uptown) - 3619 Mall Ave

üìç Fayetteville (S Town) - 557 S School Ave

Photo courtesy of Woodstone Craft Pizza

Located in both North and South Fayetteville, featuring fun and trendy atmospheres. They offer speciality pizzas and cocktails. Our go to is the wedge salad, Bloomington pizza, and pomegranate margarita. Don‚Äôt forget to try the bone sauces for dipping! The Uptown location has an amazing new patio addition for great outdoor dining.

Instagram, Facebook


Damgoode Pies

üìç 37 E Center Street

Photo courtesy of Damgoode Pies

Fun location right off the square with a casual environment. Their traditional and specialty pies are both great, and they offer draft beer. We highly recommend the pepperoni ‚Äústuffy‚Äù with pink sauce.

Instagram, Facebook


US Pizza Company

üìç 202 W Dickson Street

Photo courtesy of US Pizza

This is the ideal place for pizza after a football game. They have a great patio right on Dickson Street with homemade ranch that is to die for. The classic pizza is great, but you can also spice it up with a variety of cool flavor combinations.

Instagram, Facebook


Bocca Italian Eatery & Pizzeria

üìç 2036 N College Ave

Photo courtesy of Bocca Italian

This nicer location has homemade everything! Woodfire pizza and plenty of roasted garlic! They also offer other Italian options if you want some variety.. try any of the homemade pastas or the steak!

Instagram, Facebook


Z's Brick Oven Pizza

üìç 2730 N College Ave

Photo courtesy of Z's Brick Oven Pizza

Enjoy Brick Oven Pizza, delicious sandwiches, Grandmother's pasta dishes and tasty salads while dining in at Z's! The cozy fireplace is an excellent spot to enjoy beer or wine with your meal.

Instagram, Facebook


Marley's Pizzeria & Bar

üìç 609 W Dickson Street #103

Photo courtesy of Marley's Pizzeria & Bar

Deep dish pizza that makes you feel like you are in Chicago. Located just off of Dickson Street, it is in the heart of downtown but slightly tucked away. The apps and wings are good too!

Instagram, Facebook


Tiny Tim's Pizza

üìç 21 W Mountain Street

Photo courtesy of Tiny Tim's

Located on the Fayetteville square the thin crust pizza is amazing with great lunch portions. Don‚Äôt forget a side of their homemade ranch!

Instagram


Tim's Pizza East

üìç 1813 E Mission Blvd

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

This family owned and operated pizza joint is a staple in East Fayetteville. They are known for their pizzas being packed with flavor with lots of cheese!


Wicked Wood Fire Pizza

üìç 1946 N Birch Ave

Photo courtesy of Wicked Wood Fire Pizza

This is one of the favorites in Fayetteville. Right outside of Fossil Cove, a fantastic brewery, this food truck has some of the best wood fired pizza in the area. Our favorite is the Honey Pig for the perfect balance of spicy and sweet.

*Closed on Mondays

Instagram, Facebook


Geraldi's

üìç 20 S University Ave

Photo courtesy of Geraldi's

Cozy, authentic, Italian vibes. They offer thick crust pizza and calzones with plenty of other amazing options for non-pizza people.. try the lasagna or traditional spaghetti and meatballs!

Instagram, Facebook


Mellow Mushroom Fayetteville

üìç 1460 E Augustine Ln

Photo courtesy of Mellow Mushroom

Located near uptown Fayetteville, they are perfect for large groups. Their thick crust pizza has a great mix of artisanal and original flavors. Half priced Pizza on Wednesdays!

Instagram, Facebook


Mojo‚Äôs Pints & Pies

üìç 2630 East Citizens Dr.

Photo courtesy of Mojo's Pints and Pies

A newly opened location in East Fayetteville that offers a great patio and hearty pizzas! A great place to watch sports with a full bar and plenty of TVs - inside and out.

Instagram, Facebook


Gusano‚Äôs

üìç 1267 Steamboat Dr

Photo courtesy of Gusano's

Specializing in Chicago style pizza, they have several locations scattered around NWA. They offer trivia nights on Wednesday and happy hour all day Thursday, plus additional specials offered most other days. Check out their monthly event calendar to see what fun activities are happening.

Instagram, Facebook


Tony‚Äôs New York Style Pizza

üìç 412 W Dickson St

Photo courtesy of Tony's New York Style Pizza

Located on Dickson Street and staying open late on weekends makes for the perfect late night treat. Want pizza but don‚Äôt want a whole pizza? This is the place for you.

Facebook


Loafin Joe's

üìç 201 W Mountain St

Photo courtesy of Loafin Joe's

Located right off of the square is this great lunch spot with amazing thin or thick crust pizza, plus hearty sandwiches if you‚Äôre not feeling pizza. Don‚Äôt forget to try their legendary homemade chips!

Instagram, Facebook


Springdale

Sassafras Springs Vineyard and Winery

üìç 6461 E Guy Terry Rd

Photo courtesy of Sassafras Springs Vineyard and Winery

Cozy atmosphere with an incredible patio and great wine. They offer classic pizzas and everything you need for a fabulous charcuterie board. Wednesday you can get half priced wine if you buy a pizza.

Instagram, Facebook


MJ Pizzeria

üìç 838 N 48th St Suite A

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

The pizza here is amazing! We recommend the Tarte Flamb√© Pizza, as well as the full bar and fun patio. Some claim it‚Äôs the best in NWA!

Instagram, Facebook


The Odd Soul

üìç 126 W Emma Ave

Photo courtesy of The Odd Soul

Located in a cool, old building right off of Emma Street, you‚Äôll find a casual, chill atmosphere, great beer, and a pool table. Any of their pizzas can be made into a calzone! Plus, don‚Äôt forget to add the spicy honey and house seasoning!

Instagram, Facebook


Pizzeria Ruby

üìç 5519 Hackett St Suite 100

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

Head over to the new Johnson Square for this fun atmosphere that offers it all: Italian cocktails, appetizers, pizza, and gelato. They have a great patio and pizza by the slice during lunch. We highly recommend the White Pizza, traditional pepperoni or the Howdy Neighbor (made with Wright‚Äôs BBQ brisket)!

Instagram, Facebook


Gusano‚Äôs

üìç 1094 E Henri De Tonti Blvd

Photo courtesy of Gusano's

See above to Gusano‚Äôs Fayetteville location. The only difference is Trivia night on Tuesday night!


US Pizza of Springdale

üìç 7322 W Sunset Ave Suite A

Photo courtesy of U.S. Pizza

See above to US Pizza in Fayetteville.

Instagram, Facebook


Guido's Pizza

Springdale - üìç 4275 S Thompson St C

Tonitown - üìç 363 W Henri De Tonti Blvd

Photo courtesy of Guido's Pizza

This casual environment has classic pizzas at a great price. Plus, they have lots of other options for non-pizza people! They offer dine-in, carry-out, or delivery. Highly recommend getting Guido's delivered when you're hosting a group of friends.

Facebook


Rogers

The Rail Rogers

üìç 218 S 1st St

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

Located in Downtown Rogers you‚Äôll find a cool environment in the perfect location! Their crust is special and they offer unique pizza options. It is the local favorite, and we see why! If you‚Äôre not up for pizza, the pork shanks and wings are a favorite here!

Facebook


Old Chicago Pizza

üìç 1900 W Pleasant Grove Rd

Photo courtesy of Old Chicago Pizza

Although you may find Old Chicago in other states, this is the only Arkansas location. It is great for groups and has a Happy hour from 3-6pm.

Instagram, Facebook


Bariola‚Äôs Pizzeria

üìç 1728 S 46th St #101

Photo courtesy of Bariola's Pizzeria

The laid back atmosphere is perfect for an evening of watching sports and using the arcade. Their classic pizza has crispy crust AND they offer free ice cream.

Instagram, Facebook


Artisan Wood Fired Kitchen

üìç 2203 S Promenade Blvd

Photo courtesy of Artisan Wood Fired Kitchen

Take a break from shopping and have some pizza at the Promenade. Neapolitan inspired dough is made daily and cooked in wood fired ovens imported from Italy. And for dessert, you should try the nutella calzone!

Instagram, Facebook


Gusano‚Äôs

üìç 2603 W Pleasant Grove Rd #112

Photo courtesy of Gusano's

See above to Gusano‚Äôs Fayetteville location. The only difference is Trivia night on Tuesday night!

Instagram, Facebook


Bentonville

Oven & Tap

üìç 215 S Main St #3

Photo courtesy of Oven & Tap

This is an NWA Daily top pick! The owners‚Äô attention to detail in the atmosphere, menu, and ingredients are noticed throughout the dining experience. Starting with cocktails and appetizers is a must! (Hello, Pimento Cheese and Edamame!) Save room for their amazing pizzas (you can‚Äôt go wrong with the famous Sweet Joe)! This is the perfect spot for date night or an evening with friends.

Instagram, Facebook


Pedaler's Pub

üìç 410 SW A St

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

Fun, laid back atmosphere with a great patio‚Ä¶ perfect stop on your bike ride! They offer thin crust, wood fire pizza and have a full list of yummy appetizers and drinks!

Instagram, Facebook


Priato Pizzeria

üìç 211 NE A St

Photo courtesy of Hangry Peddler

This food truck is located in the heart of Downtown Bentonville. We highly recommend on a nice day. These artisan-crafted, Neapolitan-style pizza are made fresh and fast.

Facebook


Johnny Brusco‚Äôs New York Style Pizza

üìç ‚Äã‚Äã700 SE Walton Blvd #10

Photo courtesy of Johnny Brusco's

These New York style pizzas are great for dine in, carry out, or delivery. On Tuesdays, catch the $1 cheese slice after 4pm.

Facebook


Tavola Trattoria

üìç 108 SE A St

Photo courtesy of Tavola Trattoria

Known for their amazing italian pastas, people usually pass over the pizza offering‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt be a victim to this and try the Tavola and the U District Pizza. You also can‚Äôt go wrong with their classic Margherita. They are located in the heart of downtown Bentonville.

Instagram, Facebook


Slice

üìç 115 NW 2nd St

Photo courtesy of NWA Daily

New kids on the block and definitely worth a visit. They offer New York style pizza with dough and sauce homemade daily from a family recipe. This food truck is located right next to Bentonville Dive so you can enjoy a slice of delicious pizza with a cold beer.

Instagram


Loafin Joe's

üìç 801 SE 8th St

Photo courtesy of Loafin Joe's

A food truck at 8th Street Market near downtown Bentonville. See above description of Loafin Joe's in Fayetteville to see more details

Instagram, Facebook


Siloam Springs

Fratelli's Wood Fire Pizza

üìç 118 S Broadway St

Photo courtesy of @kruttles

Located in Downtown Siloam Springs you can find Italian style, wood fired pizza with fresh ingredients and fun toppings‚Ä¶ lots of unique pizzas to try. Bonus, there is no better way to top off a your Italian pizza experience than with a great selection of local beers and delicious gelato.

Instagram, Facebook


TJ's Pizza

üìç 8634 4290, 4290 US-412

Photo courtesy of TJ's Pizza

When dessert pizza is an option, you know all rules go out the window. Enjoy their classic pizza with homemade sauces anytime, but if you‚Äôre into wings, you should plan to go on Wednesday for wing night (a crowd favorite)!

Facebook


Eureka Springs

Cafe Amore

üìç 2070 E Van Buren

Photo courtesy of Cafe Amore

A quaint, Italian restaurant in a town full of charm. Chef Katherine makes her own pizza dough and sauce daily. Highly recommend the Cheezy Garlic Bread, ‚ÄúThe Works‚Äù pizza, and honestly all of their desserts.

Instagram, Facebook


Hotboxx Woodfire Pizza

üìç 102 State Hwy 187

Photo courtesy of Hotboxx Woodfire Pizza

Pizza is served from a wood burning pizza oven and seating is available right by the lake for beautiful views. In addition to pizza, Hotboxx offers pepperoni rolls and garlic knots (both recommend!).

Facebook
